name: Fading Away
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Fading Away is a story about a relationship, and its slow decline into a toxic necessity. It is also a platformer, where you puzzle out the hand-drawn memories of the protagonists with original music, art, and narration.

-HEADPHONES RECOMMENDED-

CONTROLS:
Use WASD to move, Space to jump, E to switch pieces in the background, and F to freeze moving platforms.
